description: This is a list of some fun indoor activities you can do at home on a day when it's not so nice to go outside. You can power lightbulbs with potatoes, grow your own crystals, make waterproof sand or your own playdoh. You can ask what to do today and it will return the full list of possible recipes. Once you know what recipe you want to make, you can ask for the ingredients list, a description of what you want to make, or the recipe on how to make it.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Rainy Day Fun what can I do today?
what are the ingredients for rock candy?
name: rainy day fun
shortDescription: Not sure what to do inside on a rainy day? This skill contains 14 possible things to do like make your own volcano or experiment with non-newtonian fluids.
